mapper.select: SELECT cube.CUBE_ID, cube.TITLE, cube.DESCRIPTION, cube.RECOMMEND, cube.RECOMMEND_CNT, broadcast.BROADCAST_ID, broadcast.CHANNEL, broadcast.TOTAL_VIEWS_CT, broadcast.BROADCAST_INFO, broadcast.OPEN_TIME, broadcast.CLOSE_TIME, broadcast.CLOSE_TIME, broadcast.MAIN_THUMBNAIL, broadcast.SUB_THUMBNAIL FROM TB_MVSS_CUBE cube, TB_MVSS_BROADCAST broadcast WHERE TYPE_CD = '01' AND cube.CUBE_ID = broadcast.CUBE_ID AND cube.STATUS_CD = '01' ORDER BY cube.RECOMMEND, cube.CREATED_DATE DESC LIMIT 5
